title: Lower normal scope-exit ordering for resource cleanup with exactly-once behavior
feature: resource cleanup lowering on normal exits

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
resource_requirements: resource cleanup actions and defer actions share a single LIFO scope-exit stack
normal scope exit executes defer before earlier-registered resource cleanup actions
each registered resource cleanup executes exactly once
runtime_assertions: res04_normal_scope_exit returns -1 if any cleanup executes zero or multiple times

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
resource_requirements: optimization preserves normal-exit LIFO ordering for defer and resource cleanup
optimization does not duplicate or elide resource cleanup callbacks
runtime_assertions: exactly-once cleanup counters are unchanged from debug mode
